c:functionType.name: SelectionChangedAction
c:functionType.c:documentation: A callback function that is called when, after selection has changed, the chart is updated to reflect the change.

c:argument.name: selectedDatums
c:argument.c:documentation: An array with the resulting selected datums.

c:argument.name: selectedChangedDatums
c:argument.c:documentation: An array with the datums whose selected state has changed since the last time that the action was handled.
